titles.title: Draw Me, I Would Run After Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Draw me, I would run after Thee
Draw me, I would run after Thee
Until the day breaks, and the shadows flee away
On the mountain of Bether, I would run after Thee.
Do you know the meaning of the song?
Is your heart surrendered all day long?
Is your understanding open to understand
The place of His dwelling on high?
